name: build_task
description: Main entry-point. Clones a source task template and prepares it for transformation into a target task. If no source is given, it helps the user choose one.

target_task.description: The name of the new task you want to create (e.g., 'Stroop').

source_task.description: Optional. The name of the template task to use as a starting point (e.g., 'Flanker').

name: list_tasks
description: Returns a list of all available task templates, including their repository name, a snippet from their README, and a list of branches.

name: download_task
description: Clones any template task repository from the registry and returns its local path.

repo.description: The name of the repository to clone.

name: localize_config
description: Translates a task's config.yaml file and sets the appropriate text-to-speech voice. Deletes old voice assets.

task_path.description: The absolute local path to the task directory containing config.yaml.

voice.description: Optional. The specific voice short_name to use (e.g., 'zh-CN-YunyangNeural'). If omitted, a suitable voice will be selected automatically.

name: list_voices
description: Lists available text-to-speech voices, which can be filtered by language.

filter_lang.description: Optional. The language code to filter voices by (e.g., 'en', 'ja').
